The Article Template

Here is a simplified version of a single article page. You can duplicate this file and replace the placeholder text with your actual article content.

I have created a new page that uses a single-column layout for easy reading. The content from your article can be placed in the <div class="prose"> block. The prose class from Tailwind's Typography plugin (which I've added) automatically formats your text to be clean and readable, like a book.
-----------------
